aircraft.value: Nighthawk Stealth - AC-2377-369 at Zone-4 Facility

defect_observed.value: Turbine blade tip erosion. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Exhaust System component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 06/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 07/01/2025 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 09/01/2025 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 10/01/2025 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 15/01/2025 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Turbine blade tip erosion. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Exhaust System component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
